Poor digital editing job: The expert pointed out that the image had obvious signs of poor digital editing, indicating that it was manipulated and not an authentic photograph.
Previous online existence: The expert mentioned that the same photograph had been online since at least April 2016, suggesting that it was not a recent or exclusive image of the Obama family in Cuba.
Source of the claim: The expert highlighted that the claim originated from a satirical website called Article 107 News, known for publishing fake news. This undermined the credibility of the claim and the photograph.
Comparison with a genuine photograph: The expert provided a comparison between the doctored image and a genuine photograph of the Obama family, demonstrating that the claim was based on manipulation rather than an actual event.
